mapper.sql: ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, ISSEND, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, SFCNUMBER, ARCHIVETYPE, ARCHIVENAME,CASEINFOID,BASERECORDID,ISSUSPECTORDER,APPROVAL
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC (ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, ISSEND, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, SFCNUMBER, ARCHIVETYPE, ARCHIVENAME,BASERECORDID,ISSUSPECTORDER,APPROVAL ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issend,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfcnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{archivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{caseinfoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baserecordid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{issuspectorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,#{approval,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

select SEQ_FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC_ID.nextval from dual
insert into FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC
ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, caseinfoid, BASERECORDID, ISSUSPECTORDER, APPROVAL,
ISSEND,
SFCNUMBER,
ARCHIVETYPE,
ARCHIVENAME,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseinfoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baserecordid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{issuspectorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0,
#{issend,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{sfcnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{archivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC
SCBJ = #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATETIME = sysdate,
JQBH = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSEND = #{issend,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORIDCARD = #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFCNUMBER = #{sfcnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARCHIVETYPE = #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARCHIVENAME = #{archivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUSPECTORDER = #{issuspectorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APPROVAL = #{approval,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC WHERE SCBJ=0 AND AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ARCHIVETYPE = 0 and rownum = 1 order by id desc

SELECT
FROM fun_archive_sfc WHERE scbj=0 AND archivetype=-1 AND ID > #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT
FROM fun_archive_sfc where ajbh in (select ajbh from tempajbh) and archivetype=-1 AND archivetype=-1

SELECT
FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC WHERE SCBJ=0 AND ID = (SELECT ARCHIVESFCID FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: UPDATE FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC SET APPROVAL = #{approval,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,UPDATETIME = sysdate WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ( SELECT
FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC WHERE SCBJ=0 AND ARCHIVETYPE > 0 AND CASEINFOID = #{caseinfoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY UPDATETIME DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM =1

SELECT
FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC WHERE SCBJ=0 AND ARCHIVETYPE=-1 AND CASEINFOID = #{caseinfoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND ROWNUM=1
